os.memory: memory_alloc memory_alloc_zero memory_free memory_set memory_copy memory_alloc_copy
os.thread: thrd_create thrd_myid thrd_enforce_exit thrd_wait_exit thrd_destroy yield
os.file: output_file_create output_file_write output_file_destroy input_file_create input_file_read input_file_destroy delete_file
os.others: log err random memory_barrier is_success swap str_len str_equal str_compare date_query

math.basic: abs min max clamp around floor ceil sq sqrt sqrt_inv degree_radian radian_degree
math.trigona: tan_radian tan_degree sin_radian sin_degree cos_radian cos_degree atan2_radian atan2_degree asin_radian asin_degree acos_radian acos_degree
math.simd: simd_write simd_read simd_add simd_sub simd_mull simd_div simd_and simd_andnot simd_or simd_xor simd_sqrt simd_rcp simd_min simd_max

container: pair triple string array vector stack queue deque set map unordered_set unordered_map slot_allocator safe_queue safe_selectee
